Title: A Physical War That Exceeds All Limits! Goku and Freeza and Ginyu, Again?!
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Plot: The bruises are multiplying as Goku and Frieza continue to pummel each other mercilessly! Meanwhile, Bulma's encounter with an unusual frog leads to an out-of-body experience!
